Each element in the periodic table excerpt is accompanied by its respective atomic number and atomic mass.

A digital globe, constructed from countless data points, slowly rotates in a void of black.

It could also be seen as a visualization of big data, with the countless particles representing the vast amounts of information being generated every second.

The video leaves a lasting impression, prompting reflection on our increasingly digital world and our place within it.
